message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a chance to purchase my product for $14,000. I believe it holds significant value and would be a worthwhile investment for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I believe that's a fair price considering the value it holds
Bob, I appreciate your interest. While I understand your perspective on the price, I believe $9,500 undervalues the product significantly. I'm willing to come down to $12,500. This is my final offer.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. I believe that's a fair price considering the value it holds and the price you're willing to sell it for
